thread.title: ESPN cuts 300 jobs as subscriber fee growth slows
thread.title_full: ESPN cuts 300 jobs as subscriber fee growth slows - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Los Angeles Times
title: ESPN cuts 300 jobs as subscriber fee growth slows
text:
Photo: Mark Lennihan, Associated Press ESPN’s John Skipper pointed to a “broad strategy.” ESPN’s John Skipper pointed to a “broad strategy.”
ESPN President John Skipper told staff Wednesday that the Disney-owned sports network will be eliminating jobs as part of “a number of organizational changes” at the company. ESPN’s John Skipper pointed to a “broad strategy.” ESPN’s John Skipper pointed to a “broad strategy.”
ESPN President John Skipper told staff Wednesday that the Disney-owned sports network will be eliminating jobs as part of “a number of organizational changes” at the company.
